subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson barely held off a strong challenge from Carl Edwards at Kansas Speedway in Kansas City, Kan., winning the race and vaulting into first place in the Chase for the Sprint Cup championship.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson barely held off a strong challenge from Carl Edwards at Kansas Speedway in Kansas City, Kan., winning the race and vaulting into first place in the Chase for the Sprint Cup championship.
